questions.question: What is the primary purpose of organizing in management?

options.a: To create chaos in the institution
options.b: To coordinate tasks and resources to achieve organizational objectives
options.c: To establish confusion among team members

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a key aspect of the organizing process?
Which of the following is an example of a curricular activity in a school?
What is the role of authority in an organization?

options.b: To ensure clear roles and responsibilities are defined

questions.question: Why is coordination important in the organizing process?

options.a: To ensure that resources are misused
options.b: To make sure activities align with organizational goals
options.d: To avoid clear communication within the organization

questions.question: What does delegation involve in an organization?

options.b: Delegating responsibility without assigning any authority
options.c: Assigning tasks along with the authority to make decisions

questions.question: Which of the following defines the relationship between different levels of authority in an organization?
What is one of the key reasons for establishing structural relationships in an organization?

options.b: To promote smooth interaction and collaboration
options.d: To assign more tasks to subordinates

questions.question: Which of the following is a necessary aspect of organizing for smooth functioning?

options.b: Ensuring employees have access to the necessary facilities and equipment

questions.question: In the organizing process, what must happen after identifying activities?

options.b: Activities must be assigned to the appropriate departments or individuals
options.c: Activities should be eliminated from the organization
